A new iPad mini deal knocks a sweet $100 off the cost of the 7th-generation tablet. And the sale includes a range of storage capacities.

Many people prefer this smallest of Apple tablets. It’s lighter and more portable than other models, but still offers the full iPad experience.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

iPad mini deal: Mini but mighty

The iPad mini 7, released last October, sets itself apart by being ultraportable. It fits in the palm of your hand while packing an 8.3-inch screen. That makes it a brilliant way to read ebooks, play games, skim through Instagram, etc. Really, anything you use your phone for now is better on a larger screen.

Among the major changes of this model is support for Apple Intelligence. This suite of AI-powered tools can fix users’ grammar, as well as generate pictures based on user instructions.

The latest iPad mini works with the Apple Pencil Pro, which debuted with the M4 iPad Pro and M2 iPad Air last year. The tiny tablet boasts a 12MP Ultra Wide Front Camera with support for the excellent Center Stage, Touch ID in a side button, two speakers and Wi-Fi 6E.

iPad mini deal: $100 off!

While it usually sells for $499, the iPad mini is available now for $399 from multiple retailers. As far as Apple deals go, that’s a good one. But an argument could be made that this should be the regular price for the capable computer. While it’s undoubtedly an outstanding small tablet, whether it’s worth $500 is debatable. Especially when the iPad 10 sells for $349.

But that’s immaterial if you shop now. Both Amazon and Best Buy knocked $100 off the cost of the 128GB version — 20% — for those who put in an order soon. And this iPad mini 7 sale applies to all colorways: black, blue, purple and silver.

Buy it from: Amazon or Best Buy

Even better, the deal also includes $100 off the variants with 256GB or 512GB of storage.

But don’t dawdle. We don’t know how long this iPad mini 7 sale will last. You might have the rest of the week, or it could be over tomorrow. How much inventory the two retailers have in stock could play a large role in the duration of the sale.

iPad mini 7 is tiny but boasts an 8.3-inch screen. iPadOS makes it a powerful computer, and it beats even the largest iPhone for watching video or playing games.
